snippet.title: Ferocious - Official Teaser Trailer | Publisher Spotlight Showcase 2023 (TinyBuild)
snippet.description:
Watch the very short teaser for Ferocious, revealing the full trailer will be available on June 11, 2023. Ferocious is a survival shooter in which you will discover a lost prehistoric world full of deadly creatures under the control of hostile forces. Fight, Explore, Survive.

#IGN #SoG #Gaming
